SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Set Up Interest Tags to Tag your Disclosure Questions and Responses

Interest tags are used to tag a user’s disclosure questions and response preferences. Search for common interest tags to look for responses when filling out the disclosure questionnaire. Make sure that everyone in your company uses a common interest tag dictionary and records are consistently tagged with terms from that global repository.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To configure interest tags:	Access Interest Tags for Financial Services Cloud
Set up topics for each of these objects before you set up interest tags:
Assessment Question
Assessment Question Set
Assessment Question Response
Document Clauses
Document Clause Sets
See Enable Topics for Objects to Use with Interest Tags.
To tag a user’s disclosure questions and response preferences, set up interest tags.
See Interest Tags.
Add the Interest Tags Lightning component to the assessment questions, document clauses, and clause set pages by using the edit page option so that users can easily add the appropriate tags to the records.
See Add the Interest Tags Lightning Component to Record Pages.
Add the Interest Tags Lightning Component to Record Pages
Add the Interest Tags lightning component to record pages so that your users can search for and assign interest tags to client records.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Configuring Interest Tags in Net Zero Cloud
